TRUDI 2026 will take place at the Mathematical Institute of the University of Cologne, Germany.

All scheduled talks and organized sessions will be held in the
main room **Cohn-Vossen** (room 313). Adjacent to it, **Seminarraum 3** (room 314) will serve as the catering area for
lunch and coffee breaks and as an informal workspace for discussions and small-group collaboration,
particularly during free or hacking sessions.

## Address
University of Cologne  
Faculty of Mathematics and Natural Sciences  
Division of Mathematics  
Weyertal 86 – 90  
50931 Cologne  
Germany

## Evening activities
There are many restaurants and bars in Cologne (obviously!). Relatively close to the workshop venue
is an area called *Zülpicher Straße*, starting at the tram station *Dasselstraße/Bf Süd*. There
are many options for dinner and drinks.
